sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Play, Users, Award, Clock, Star, ArrowRight, Code, Database, Cloud, Brain, Calculator, Globe, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: Users, title: 'Expert Instructors', description: 'Learn from industry professionals with years of real-world experience.' }, { icon: Clock, title: 'Flexible Learning', description: 'Study at your own pace with 24/7 access to course materials.' }, { icon: Award, title: 'Certification', description: 'Earn industry-recognized certificates upon course completion.' }, { icon: Play, title: 'Hands-on Projects', description: 'Build real-world projects to strengthen your portfolio.' } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'Full Stack Developer', company: 'TechCorp', content: 'The MERN Stack course completely transformed my career. I went from knowing nothing to landing a developer job in 6 months!', rating: 5, avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'DevOps Engineer', company: 'CloudTech', content: 'The AWS DevOps course was incredibly comprehensive. The hands-on labs and real-world scenarios prepared me perfectly for my current role.', rating: 5, avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { name: 'Emily Rodriguez', role: 'Data Scientist', company: 'AI Solutions', content: 'The AI/ML course opened up a whole new world for me. The instructors made complex concepts easy to understand.', rating: 5, avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '10,000+', label: 'Students Enrolled' }, { number: '50+', label: 'Expert Instructors' }, { number: '95%', label: 'Success Rate' }, { number: '24/7', label: 'Support Available' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Transform Your Career with Expert-Led Courses

Master in-demand skills with our comprehensive online courses. Learn from industry experts and advance your career in technology.

Explore Courses
{/* Scroll indicator */}
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose EdTech?

We provide the best learning experience with expert instructors, flexible schedules, and hands-on projects.

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Popular Courses Preview */}

Popular Courses

Start your journey with our most popular courses designed by industry experts.

{[ { icon: Code, title: 'Web Development', color: 'blue' }, { icon: Database, title: 'MERN Stack', color: 'green' }, { icon: Cloud, title: 'AWS DevOps', color: 'orange' }, { icon: Brain, title: 'AI/ML', color: 'purple' }, { icon: Calculator, title: 'Mathematics', color: 'red' }, { icon: Globe, title: 'Digital Marketing', color: 'teal' } ].map((course, index) => (

{course.title}

Master the fundamentals and advanced concepts with hands-on projects.

Learn More
))}
View All Courses
{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Our Students Say

Hear from our successful graduates who have transformed their careers with our courses.

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.role} at {testimonial.company}

{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.content}"

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Transform Your Career?

Join thousands of students who have already taken the first step towards their dream career.

Get Started Today Contact Us
); }; export default Home;
